definition: to revolve/to turn/to circle about/to walk about/classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm/classifier for repeated actions
to turn/to change direction/to transfer/to forward (mail)
to transmit/to lead/to guide/to conduct/to direct

sentences.english: The expression level of SEAP elevated gradually with increasing m.
sentences.chinese: 腺病毒轉導的SEAP的表達卻是逐漸上升。

sentences.english: The possible mechanism is through PKC signaling transduction pathway activation.
sentences.chinese: 激活PKC信號轉導途徑可能是其部分機制。

sentences.english: The effect of insulin is highly associated with IRS1 signaling cascades.
sentences.chinese: 胰島素的這種作用與IRS1信號轉導通路密切相關。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the changes of signal transduction in tumor cell with photodynamic therapy.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討光動力作用對腫瘤細胞信號轉導系統的影響。

sentences.english: DOC-2 is a novel phosphoprotein with signal-transducing capability.
sentences.chinese: 2是具有信號轉導功能的新的磷蛋白。

sentences.english: Neuregulin-1 (NRG-1) is a signaling protein among cells produced by glial cells and neurons.
sentences.chinese: 是神經膠質及神經元產生的細胞間信號轉導蛋白。

sentences.english: Expression of the transduced genes were confirmed by RT-PCR.
sentences.chinese: 瘤內注射基因表達載體，使基因轉導入腫瘤細胞。

sentences.english: How do certain diseases affect signal transduction?
sentences.chinese: 某些疾病如何影響了信號轉導？

sentences.english: The uptake mechanism of cell-penetrating peptides is currently a topic of heated discussion, which is not clear yet.
sentences.chinese: 其轉導機制一直是研究的熱點，至今仍不明確。

sentences.english: Objective: To investigate the effect of zinc deficiency on phosphoinositol signal transduction system in rat brain.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討缺鋅對大鼠腦肌醇磷脂信號轉導系統的影響。

sentences.english: JNK signaling transduction pathway plays a vivtal role in the neuronal apoptosis.
sentences.chinese: JNK信號轉導途徑參與神經元凋亡。

sentences.english: Influence of Gravity Change on EGF-induced Signal Transduction.
sentences.chinese: 重力變化對錶皮生長因子誘導的信號轉導的影響。

sentences.english: Myocardial ischemic preconditioning is related to cellular signal transduction.
sentences.chinese: 心肌缺血預適應與細胞信號轉導密切相關。

sentences.english: Integration of the transduced gene was detected by genomic PCR.
sentences.chinese: 用PCR檢測轉導基因在基因組中的整合。

sentences.english: In this paper, we give a detailed review about signal transduction of self-incompatibility in Brassica.
sentences.chinese: 主要針對蕓薹屬自交不親和細胞信號轉導作一綜述。

sentences.english: This may occur during the lysogenic life cycle of a temperate bacteriophage.
sentences.chinese: 特異性轉導是在溫和噬菌體的溶原期發生的。
